page.title: 17LONGFORGAN - CASTLE HUNTLY
page.content: From the top of the castle is a nice view and at the bottom of the castle are the dungeons. My father is a prison officer and he has to guard the Borstal boys in case they run away. I play with my friends on our bikes and we go up to and around the castle. At night people say there is a "White Lady" who haunts the castle. It is interesting inside the castle, we call the boys inmates and they go out digging tatties and play soccer on the pitch at the back of the castle. Every year they have a sportsday. I play with my friends and we go along by the workshops on our bikes and then up the hill to the castle where we can hear bats squeaking, and it is said that footsteps can be heard coming from the roof of the castle. My Dad often works at night and comes home at 7.00 am to sleep for part of the day.
